subject: Football
lead_paragraph: It must be nice for Michael Strahan to know you can take off the sweatiest month of the season, and then a holiday weekend, and still have a job. But what an insult to everyone else.
snippet: It must be nice for Michael Strahan to know you can take off the sweatiest month of the season, and then a holiday weekend, and still have a job. But what an insult to everyone else.
